citation: Ames, D. R., Rose, P., & Anderson, C. P. (2006). The NPI-16 as a short measure of narcissism.
note: NPI-16 items mapped to NPI factor structure. Each item represents the narcissistic choice from the forced-choice pair.

items.text: I know that I am good because everybody keeps telling me so
I like to be the center of attention
I think I am a special person
I like having authority over people
I find it easy to manipulate people
I insist upon getting the respect that is due me
I am apt to show off if I get the chance
I always know what I am doing
Everybody likes to hear my stories
I expect a great deal from other people
I really like to be the center of attention
People always seem to recognize my authority
I am going to be a great person
I can make anybody believe anything I want them to
I am more capable than other people
